original_text: The fourteenth day of the second month at even they shall keep it, and eat it with unleavened bread and bitter herbs.
korean_text: 둘째 달 열넷째 날 해 질 때에 그것을 지켜서 어린 양에 무교병과 쓴 나물을 아울러 먹을 것이요

sentences.original_text: The fourteenth day of the second month at even
sentences.korean_translation: 두 번째 달 열넷째 날 저녁에

sentences.original_text: and eat it with unleavened bread
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 누룩 없는 빵과 함께 그것을 먹어라
